Attributes.description: Investigation of historical and contemporary scholarship on the diversity of families, focusing on differences of gender, sexuality, race/ethnicity, and social class within and across national borders.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102. (or third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: To, Room: Be
